alert.note: Alert for Eastern Hillsborough; Interior Rockingham; Strafford (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 16 at 10:36PM EST until December 17 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy, wet snow. Snowfall amounts of 2 to 5 inches. The lowest amounts will occur east of Manchester and Nashua towards the Seacoast. The highest amounts will be in the higher terrain of northern Rockingham and Stafford Counties where several inches are expected. * WHERE...Strafford, Eastern Hillsborough, and Interior Rockingham Counties. * WHEN...Until 7 PM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be slick due to snow accumulations on roads. Wet snow at times may lead to downed tree limbs, resulting in isolated to scattered power outages. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will mix with rain at times expecially from Manchester/Nashua and to the east.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by going to newengland511.org
